channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Can AI chatbots make your holiday shopping easier?
item.description: Tired of thinking about what gifts to get everyone this year? Artificial intelligence chatbots might help, but don’t expect them to always give you the right answers.

item.title: Cyber Monday shoppers expected to set a record on the year’s biggest day for online shopping
item.description: Consumers in the U.S. are scouring the internet for online deals as they look to make the most of the post-Thanksgiving shopping marathon on Cyber Monday.

item.title: It’s the final holiday stretch at the Biden White House. The theme is ‘A Season of Peace and Light’
item.description: It’s the final holiday stretch at the White House for President Joe Biden and his wife, Jill, and the theme is “A Season of Peace and Light.”
